Question: On September 8, 2007, this person performed his 1,000th live show at Idaho Falls, Idaho.
Hints: This person was also a judge for the 10th annual Independent Music Awards to support independent artists' careers.
This person's first show with his new band was on March 31, 1982.
They used to have a pet poodle, named Bela (pictured atop this person's head on the cover of his album, Poodle Hat).
